channel.title: TIP on Yida Wang
channel.description: Recent content in TIP on Yida Wang

item.title: Generative Model with Coordinate Metric Learning for Object Recognition Based on 3D Models
item.description: Abstrarct Collecting data for deep learning is so tedious which makes it hard to establish a perfect database. In this paper, we propose a generative model trained with synthetic images rendered from 3D models which can reduce the burden on collecting real training data and make the background conditions more sundry. Our architecture is composed of two subnetworks: semantic foreground object reconstruction network based on Bayesian inference and classification network based on multi-triplet cost training for avoiding over-fitting on monotone synthetic object surface and utilizing accurate informations of synthetic images like object poses and lightning conditions which are helpful for recognizing regular photos.
